header: Accept Those Weak In The Faith

verse: Now be accepting the one being weak in the faith— [but] not for disputes about opinions.

header: Don’t Judge The Opinions of Fellow Servants of Your Master

verse: One has faith to eat all things, but the one being weak eats vegetables.
Let not the one eating be treating-with-contempt the one not eating. And let not the one not eating be judging the one eating— for God accepted him.
Who are you, the one judging a household-servant belonging-to-another? To his own master he stands or falls. And he will stand, for the Lord is able to make him stand.

header: Live For The Lord As You Think Best, For Each of Us Will Give an Account To God

verse: For one judges a day beyond a day, but another judges every day alike. Let each one be fully-convinced in his own mind.

The one thinking as to the day, is thinking for the Lord. And the one eating, is eating for the Lord— for he gives-thanks to God. And the one not eating, is not eating for the Lord— and he gives-thanks to God.
For none of us lives for himself, and none dies for himself.
For if we live, we live for the Lord; and if we die, we die for the Lord. Therefore if we live and if we die, we are the Lord’s.
For Christ died and came-to-life for this: that He might be-Lord both of dead and living ones.
But why are you judging your brother? Or why also are you treating your brother with contempt? For we will all stand before the judgment-seat of God.
For it has been written [in Isa 45:23]: “As I live”, says the Lord, “every knee will bow to Me. And every tongue will confess-out to God”.
So then, each of us will give an account for himself to God.

header: Don’t Let Your Good Choices Cause Spiritual Harm To Others; Walk In Love

verse: Therefore let us no longer be judging one another. But rather judge this: not to be placing an opportunity-for-stumbling or a cause-of-falling for the brother
(I know and am convinced in the Lord Jesus that nothing is defiled in itself , except to the one considering anything to be defiled— to that one it is defiled).
For if your brother is grieved because of food, you are no longer walking according-to love. Do not be destroying with your food that one for whom Christ died.
Therefore do not be letting your good thing be blasphemed.
For the kingdom of God is not eating and drinking, but righteousness and peace and joy in the Holy Spirit.
For the one serving Christ in this is pleasing to God and approved by people.

header: Let Us Be Pursuing Peace And Things That Build Up, Not Things That Tear Down

verse: So then, let us be pursuing the things of  peace and the things of edification for one another.
Do not be tearing-down the work of God for the sake of food. All things are clean— but it is evil for the person eating with an opportunity-for-stumbling.
It is good not to eat meats, nor to drink wine, nor to do anything by which your brother stumbles.

header: Hold To Your Convictions, But Carry The Weak. Don’t Just Please Yourselves

verse: The faith which you have, be having for yourself in the sight of God. Blessed is the one not judging himself in what he is approving.
But the one doubting has been condemned if he eats, because it was not from faith— and everything which is not from faith is sin.
